meanings.definition: A type of legging worn by Native American men.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his peags during the traditional ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The Native American man put on his peags before heading out to hunt.
meanings.sent3: The peags danced along with the rhythm of the drums at the powwow.
meanings.sent4: His peags were like a shield, protecting him from the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the peags caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A type of decorative fringe or tassel.
meanings.sent1: The curtains were adorned with beautiful peags that swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: She added peags to her dress to give it a unique and stylish look.
meanings.sent3: The peags on the lampshade added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was decorated with colorful peags that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The peags on the pillow added a playful touch to the decor.

meanings.definition: A type of ornament or decoration made of beads or shells.
meanings.sent1: The necklace was adorned with beautiful peags that sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent2: She carefully crafted peags to decorate the ceremonial headdress.
meanings.sent3: The peags on the dreamcatcher swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her bracelet jingled with every movement, thanks to the peags attached to it.
meanings.sent5: The peags on the belt added a touch of color to his traditional attire.
